name: Rick Swiggins: 6th Grade Sleuth
description:
Meet Rick Swiggins, P.I.

Play as the delusional Rick Swiggins, a sixth grader who's convinced that there's some sort of criminal underbelly hiding inside his unassuming middle school. Break your way into the 8th grade dance and halt an illicit deal in its tracks (or find out that you go to a normal school and nothing was really going on in the first place).

Known Bugs:
  • Incorrect sprite for the suit
  • Some Checklist doubling bugs
  • Occasional issues using items
